section_title: IPCC 2006 Guidelines for national GHG inventories
sentences: Thelma Krug, IPCC, presented the IPCC 2006 Guidelines.
ARGENTINA and others said more time was needed to reach conclusions, while the EU suggested elaborating a draft decision at this session.
INTERNATIONAL HYDROPOWER ASSOCIATION urged careful consideration of the section on flooded lands.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
